title: Logging onto chat service
body:
When I log into League, at the bottom it says Logging onto chat service. This started yesterday 9/22/16. I did play the day before 9/21/16 and never had an issue.


I have attempted the following as suggested from previous forums:
Reset password
Flush DNS
Set day forward on computer and switch back
Relog in multiple times (x20)
Reset cookies and cache on internet
Disabled firewall
I played a game, which i was able to chat once the game was started but not before or after game.

Any other suggestions? Or Riot do you have a fix that I have not attempted yet or see in your support section?

replies.body: I've been having this exact same problem...I just found this thread here.  Before, I was looking on the EUW threads, which of course are not too helpful for us...

It sounds like your network is specifically having trouble connecting to the chat servers, and a repair won't really fix that because it focuses on file repair.  Instead, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and reconnect.  Make sure to go over each step to make sure everything's covered.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I found the problem. It was the newest Windows 10 update on 9/22/16. So you might want to look into that and see if there is a setting that would need to be changed.
The ISCI Netalyzer will not work on Chrome, Firefox or IE. I ran the hextech repair tool as well. in the logs it says packets 4/4 0%loss. what do you suggest?

Also forgot I did the repair from the main laucher.

NA server
